name: Daði & Gagnamagnið.. & Aliens!
description:
The official Daði & Gagnamagnið video game.

Help Daði rescue Gagnamagnið and defeat the music hating aliens in this platformer/rhythm game. This game tells an exclusive story that takes place in between the "Think About Things" and "10 Years" music videos with original music from Daði Freyr, hidden characters and all original artwork.

This game was made by six individuals who are passionate about video games, thereof Daði Freyr and Jói from Gagnamagnið. It was developed over a five month period with lots of love and pure dedication to provide an enjoyable experience for Daði & Gagnamagnið fans as well as other Eurovision and/or video game fans.

For optimal user experience we recommend using headphones when playing the game or turning your speaker volume up.



WARNING:
This game contains several sequences of flashing lights which may affect people who are susceptible to photosensitive epilepsy or other photo sensitivities.
